resources.string:
This is the privacy policy for WHAT-TO-WEAR provided by the Group 1 of the KTH, TCOMM course Developing Mobile Applications!

Chapter 1: Clarifications
With GROUP we will mean the team of students that developed this application.
With YOU we will mean the user.

Chapter 2: Data Collection
We do not really collect any of your data yet. In the future when this is not a prototype we will collect your e-mail to make an account for you.

Chapter 3: Third-Party software
There is no third-party software

Chapter 4: Bluh bluh
